message: Pictures of Sharon's whiteboard are here: https://www.sugarsync.com/pf/D189336_6784632_927678
I was thinking that maybe the "generic" bug tracking information should be our first "extension" instead of building it into the Testcase object
it would be a good test to make sure we have extensions built properly
So I'm unclear on the extensions design.  How will a test case be tied to a "bug" as an extension?
Extensions are data, REST, and UI addons that allow you to addon to the core data pieces
For a bug extension, We would create a bug extension data class, and some UI, and we could add it into the Testcase data type
I'll try to build an example extension and show it to you.
